original_name: Once Upon a Time in the West
name: Once Upon a Time in the West
tagline: There were three men in her life. One to take her... one to love her... and one to kill her.
overview: Once Upon a Time in the West is the first and most ambitious film from a trilogy by Sergio Leones. This classic western masterpiece is an epic film about a widow whoâ€™s land and life are in danger as the railroad is getting closer and closer to taking them over. A mysterious harmonica player joins forces with Desperado to protect the woman and her land. Brilliant performances and a daring cinematic
